lyrics.stanza: Lord Jesus, in Thy precious name, And in that name alone; At Thy request we gladly meet, Thy Lordship here would own.
As on that dark betrayal night, Thou didst this feast ordain; We too, the bread and cup would take, Thy death, Lord, thus proclaim.
The Host art Thou, O blessed Lord, Thy honored guests are we; With grateful and adoring hearts We would remember Thee!
Lord Jesus, whom unseen we love, As thus we muse on Thee; We none would see, save Thee alone, Thou Man of Calvary!
